thread.title: ‘TUF 25: Redemption’ Cast Includes Joe Stevenson, James Krause, Eddie Gordon
thread.title_full: ‘TUF 25: Redemption’ Cast Includes Joe Stevenson, James Krause, Eddie Gordon

author: tcritchfield@sherdog.com (Tristen Critchfield)
title: ‘TUF 25: Redemption’ Cast Includes Joe Stevenson, James Krause, Eddie Gordon
text: The UFC has revealed the 14-man cast for “The Ultimate Fighter: Redemption,” and there are some familiar faces present. Everyone competing on the latest iteration of the long-running reality series has appeared on a previous season of “TUF.” Some notable names include former lightweight title challenger Joe Stevenson , “TUF 19” winner Eddie Gordon and James Krause , who is currently on the UFC roster and has won his last two fights within the Las Vegas-based promotion. The winner of “TUF 25” will receive a UFC contract and a $250,000 prize. The show premieres April 19 on Fox Sports 1 at 10 p.m. ET/7 p.m. PT. The finalists will meet at the “TUF 25” finale in July. Bantamweight champion Cody Garbrandt and former titlist T.J. Dillashaw will serve as opposing coaches on the show before squaring off in a title bout in July as well. ”The Ultimate Fighter 25: Redemption” Cast: Julian Lane -- 11-6, 29, Mansfield, Ohio Mehdi Baghdad -- 11-5, 31, Los Angeles, Calif. Justin Edwards -- 9-5, 34, Bellefontaine, Ohio Ramsey Nijem -- 9-6, 28, Salt Lake City, Utah Tom Gallicchio --19-9, 30, Temecula, Calif. Gilbert Smith -- 12-6, 35, Colorado Springs, Colo. Joe Stevenson -- 33-16, 34, Victorville, Calif. Hayder Hassan -- 6-3, 34, Coconut Creek, Fla. Jesse Taylor -- 30-15, 34, Temecula, Calif. James Krause -- 23-7, 30, Lee’s Summit, Mo. Hector Urbina -- 17-10, 29, Coconut Creek, Calif.
